name: Origin
description: Installs 10.5.40.26928 version of Origin.Ignore messages about new version of Origin - they don't work.

task.app: nocrashdialog arial vcrun2010 vcrun2013 vcrun2015 win7 d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 d3dx9
task.name: winetricks
wineexec
task.description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.

content:
files:
- client: https://lutris.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/games/origin/OriginSetup.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/Origin.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: mkdir "$GAMEDIR/nv-shaders"
- write_file:
    content: dxgi.nvapiHack = False
    file: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
- task:
    app: nocrashdialog arial vcrun2010 vcrun2013 vcrun2015 win7 d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47
      d3dx9
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
      QtWebEngineProcess.exe
    executable: client
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_CONFIG_FILE: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/nv-shaders
  exclude_processes: QtWebEngineProcess.exe ActivationUI.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    OriginThinSetupInternal.exe: disabled
    nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
